attributes.action: Request the The Royal Mail temporarily scrap 1st and 2nd class mail.
attributes.additional_details:
My girlfriend is quite ill and she has missed an appointment due to a letter arriving over a week after the appointment date. This is not acceptable. She recently recieved a letter just in time for another appointment.
As mentioned before, if The Royal Mail are currently falling far behind with deliveries (as they are here), then I strongly believe until things are back to normal and they can once again deliver a good service there should be no 1st or 2nd class but a set price between the two.
attributes.background: The Royal Mail are saying 'due to Covid' they can't gaurantee delivery times. If they can't gaurantee delivery within a 1st class period then they should not be allowed to charge for 1st class. Until they can once more deliver on time I feel there should be a fixed price between 1st and 2nd class.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. As a company, the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for its operation.
